rows.arabic: بِسْمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ
rows.translation: In the name of Allah, most benevolent, ever-merciful.
rows.transliteration: bismillāhir raḥmānir raḥīm

rows.arabic: قُلْ أُوحِىَ إِلَىَّ أَنَّهُ ٱسْتَمَعَ نَفَرٌ مِّنَ ٱلْجِنِّ فَقَالُوٓا۟ إِنَّا سَمِعْنَا قُرْءَانًا عَجَبًا
rows.translation: SAY: "I HAVE been informed that a number of jinns had listened; then said: 'We have heard the wondrous Qur'an,
rows.transliteration: qul ūḥiya ilayya annahus tama`a nafarun minal jinni faqālū innā sami`nā qur-ānan `ajabā

rows.arabic: يَهْدِىٓ إِلَى ٱلرُّشْدِ فَـَٔامَنَّا بِهِۦ ۖ وَلَن نُّشْرِكَ بِرَبِّنَآ أَحَدًا
rows.translation: Which guides to the right path; and we have come to believe in it, and will not associate any one with our Lord.
rows.transliteration: yahdī ilar rushdi fa-āmannā bih ۖ walan nushrika birabbinā aḥadā

rows.arabic: وَأَنَّهُۥ تَعَـٰلَىٰ جَدُّ رَبِّنَا مَا ٱتَّخَذَ صَـٰحِبَةً وَلَا وَلَدًا
rows.translation: Exalted is the glory of our Lord; He has neither wife nor son.
rows.transliteration: wa-annahu ta`ālā jaddu rabbinā mat-takhadha ṣāḥibatan walā waladā

rows.arabic: وَأَنَّهُۥ كَانَ يَقُولُ سَفِيهُنَا عَلَى ٱللَّهِ شَطَطًا
rows.translation: Certainly the foolish among us say preposterous things of God.
rows.transliteration: wa-annahu kāna yaqūlu safīhunā `alallāhi shaṭaṭā

rows.arabic: وَأَنَّا ظَنَنَّآ أَن لَّن تَقُولَ ٱلْإِنسُ وَٱلْجِنُّ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ كَذِبًا
rows.translation: We had in fact thought that men and jinns would never speak a lie about God,
rows.transliteration: wa-annā ẓanannā an lan taqūlal-insu wal jinnu `alallāhi kadhibā

rows.arabic: وَأَنَّهُۥ كَانَ رِجَالٌ مِّنَ ٱلْإِنسِ يَعُوذُونَ بِرِجَالٍ مِّنَ ٱلْجِنِّ فَزَادُوهُمْ رَهَقًا
rows.translation: But some men used to seek refuge with some jinns, and this increased their waywardness;
rows.transliteration: wa-annahu kāna rijālun minal-insi ya`ūdhūna birijālin minal jinni fazādūhum rahaqā

rows.arabic: وَأَنَّهُمْ ظَنُّوا۟ كَمَا ظَنَنتُمْ أَن لَّن يَبْعَثَ ٱللَّهُ أَحَدًا
rows.translation: So they began to think, even as you do, that God would not resurrect any one.
rows.transliteration: wa-annahum ẓannū kamā ẓanantum an lan yab`athallāhu aḥadā

rows.arabic: وَأَنَّا لَمَسْنَا ٱلسَّمَآءَ فَوَجَدْنَـٰهَا مُلِئَتْ حَرَسًا شَدِيدًا وَشُهُبًا
rows.translation: We sought to pry into the secrets of the heavens, but found it full of fierce guards and shooting flames.
rows.transliteration: wa-annā lamasnas samā-a fawajadnāhā muli-at ḥarasan shadīdan washuhubā

rows.arabic: وَأَنَّا كُنَّا نَقْعُدُ مِنْهَا مَقَـٰعِدَ لِلسَّمْعِ ۖ فَمَن يَسْتَمِعِ ٱلْـَٔانَ يَجِدْ لَهُۥ شِهَابًا رَّصَدًا
rows.translation: We sat in observatories to listen; but any one who listened found a shooting star in wait for him.
rows.transliteration: wa-annā kunnā naq`udu minhā maqā`ida lissam` ۖ faman yastami`il-āna yajid lahu shihāban raṣadā

rows.arabic: وَأَنَّا لَا نَدْرِىٓ أَشَرٌّ أُرِيدَ بِمَن فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ أَمْ أَرَادَ بِهِمْ رَبُّهُمْ رَشَدًا
rows.translation: We do not know if this means ill for the dwellers of the earth, or their Lord wishes guidance for them.
rows.transliteration: wa-annā lā nadrī asharrun urīda biman fil-arḍi am arāda bihim rabbuhum rashadā

rows.arabic: وَأَنَّا مِنَّا ٱلصَّـٰلِحُونَ وَمِنَّا دُونَ ذَٰلِكَ ۖ كُنَّا طَرَآئِقَ قِدَدًا
rows.translation: For some of us are upright and some otherwise: Surely we follow different ways.
rows.transliteration: wa-annā minnaṣ ṣāliḥūna wa minnā dūna dhālik ۖ kunnā ṭarā-iqa qidadā

rows.arabic: وَأَنَّا ظَنَنَّآ أَن لَّن نُّعْجِزَ ٱللَّهَ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ وَلَن نُّعْجِزَهُۥ هَرَبًا
rows.translation: We realised that we could not weaken the power of God on earth, nor outpace Him by running away.
rows.transliteration: wa-annā ẓanannā an lan nu`jizallāha fil-arḍi walan nu`jizahu harabā

rows.arabic: وَأَنَّا لَمَّا سَمِعْنَا ٱلْهُدَىٰٓ ءَامَنَّا بِهِۦ ۖ فَمَن يُؤْمِنۢ بِرَبِّهِۦ فَلَا يَخَافُ بَخْسًا وَلَا رَهَقًا
rows.translation: So when we heard the guidance we believed in it; and he who believes in his Lord will neither fear loss nor force.
rows.transliteration: wa-annā lammā sami`nal hudā āmannā bih ۖ faman yu-min birabbihi falā yakhāfu bakhsan walā rahaqā

rows.arabic: وَأَنَّا مِنَّا ٱلْمُسْلِمُونَ وَمِنَّا ٱلْقَـٰسِطُونَ ۖ فَمَنْ أَسْلَمَ فَأُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ تَحَرَّوْا۟ رَشَدًا
rows.translation: Some of us have come to submission, and some of us are iniquitous.'" Those who have submitted have taken the right course;
rows.transliteration: wa-annā minnal muslimūna wa minnal qāsiṭūn ۖ faman aslama fa-ulā-ika taḥarraw rashadā

rows.arabic: وَأَمَّا ٱلْقَـٰسِطُونَ فَكَانُوا۟ لِجَهَنَّمَ حَطَبًا
rows.translation: But those who are iniquitous will be fuel for Hell.
rows.transliteration: wa-ammal qāsiṭūna fakānū lijahannama ḥaṭabā

rows.arabic: وَأَلَّوِ ٱسْتَقَـٰمُوا۟ عَلَى ٱلطَّرِيقَةِ لَأَسْقَيْنَـٰهُم مَّآءً غَدَقًا
rows.translation: (Say): "If they keep to the right path We shall give them water in abundance to drink
rows.transliteration: wa-allawis-taqāmū `alaṭ ṭarīqati la-asqaynāhum mā-an ghadaqā

rows.arabic: لِّنَفْتِنَهُمْ فِيهِ ۚ وَمَن يُعْرِضْ عَن ذِكْرِ رَبِّهِۦ يَسْلُكْهُ عَذَابًا صَعَدًا
rows.translation: In order to try them through it. But whoever turns away from the remembrance of his Lord, will be given increasing torment by Him."
rows.transliteration: linaftinahum fīh ۚ wa man yu`riḍ `an dhikri rabbihi yasluk-hu `adhāban ṣa`adā

rows.arabic: وَأَنَّ ٱلْمَسَـٰجِدَ لِلَّهِ فَلَا تَدْعُوا۟ مَعَ ٱللَّهِ أَحَدًا
rows.translation: All places of worship are for God; so do not invoke any one with God.
rows.transliteration: wa-annal masājida lillāhi falā tad`ū ma`allāhi aḥadā

rows.arabic: وَأَنَّهُۥ لَمَّا قَامَ عَبْدُ ٱللَّهِ يَدْعُوهُ كَادُوا۟ يَكُونُونَ عَلَيْهِ لِبَدًا
rows.translation: When the devotee of God stood up to invoke Him (the jinns) crowded upon him (to listen).
rows.transliteration: wa-annahu lammā qāma `abdullāhi yad`ūhu kādū yakūnūna `alayhi libadā

rows.arabic: قُلْ إِنَّمَآ أَدْعُوا۟ رَبِّى وَلَآ أُشْرِكُ بِهِۦٓ أَحَدًا
rows.translation: Say: "I call on my Lord alone and I do not associate any one with Him."
rows.transliteration: qul innamā ad`ū rabbī walā ushriku bihi aḥadā

rows.arabic: قُلْ إِنِّى لَآ أَمْلِكُ لَكُمْ ضَرًّا وَلَا رَشَدًا
rows.translation: Say: "Neither is your loss within my power nor bringing you to guidance."
rows.transliteration: qul innī lā amliku lakum ḍarran walā rashadā

rows.arabic: قُلْ إِنِّى لَن يُجِيرَنِى مِنَ ٱللَّهِ أَحَدٌ وَلَنْ أَجِدَ مِن دُونِهِۦ مُلْتَحَدًا
rows.translation: Say: "No one can save me from God, nor can I find a place of refuge apart from Him,
rows.transliteration: qul innī lan yujīranī minallāhi aḥadun walan ajida min dūnihi multaḥadā

rows.arabic: إِلَّا بَلَـٰغًا مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ وَرِسَـٰلَـٰتِهِۦ ۚ وَمَن يَعْصِ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥ فَإِنَّ لَهُۥ نَارَ جَهَنَّمَ خَـٰلِدِينَ فِيهَآ أَبَدًا
rows.translation: Unless I convey from God and deliver His message." For those who disobey God and His Apostle is the fire of Hell, where they will abide for ever;
rows.transliteration: illā balāghan minallāhi warisālātih ۚ wa man ya`ṣillāha warasūlahu fa-inna lahu nāra jahannama khālidīna fīhā abadā

rows.arabic: حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا رَأَوْا۟ مَا يُوعَدُونَ فَسَيَعْلَمُونَ مَنْ أَضْعَفُ نَاصِرًا وَأَقَلُّ عَدَدًا
rows.translation: Until they see what they are promised, when they will understand who is weaker in aid and poorer in numbers.
rows.transliteration: ḥattā idhā ra-aw mā yū`adūna fasaya`lamūna man aḍ`afu nāṣiran wa-aqallu `adadā

rows.arabic: قُلْ إِنْ أَدْرِىٓ أَقَرِيبٌ مَّا تُوعَدُونَ أَمْ يَجْعَلُ لَهُۥ رَبِّىٓ أَمَدًا
rows.translation: Say: "I do not know if what is promised you is near, or if my Lord prolongs its term.
rows.transliteration: qul in adrī aqarībun mā tū`adūna am yaj`alu lahu rabbī amadā

rows.arabic: عَـٰلِمُ ٱلْغَيْبِ فَلَا يُظْهِرُ عَلَىٰ غَيْبِهِۦٓ أَحَدًا
rows.translation: He is the knower of the Unknown, and He does not divulge His secret to any one
rows.transliteration: `ālimul ghaybi falā yuẓhiru `alā ghaybihi aḥadā

rows.arabic: إِلَّا مَنِ ٱرْتَضَىٰ مِن رَّسُولٍ فَإِنَّهُۥ يَسْلُكُ مِنۢ بَيْنِ يَدَيْهِ وَمِنْ خَلْفِهِۦ رَصَدًا
rows.translation: Other than an apostle He has chosen, when He makes a sentinel walk in front of him and a sentinel behind,
rows.transliteration: illā manir-taḍā min rasūlin fa-innahu yasluku min bayni yadayhi wa min khalfihi raṣadā

rows.arabic: لِّيَعْلَمَ أَن قَدْ أَبْلَغُوا۟ رِسَـٰلَـٰتِ رَبِّهِمْ وَأَحَاطَ بِمَا لَدَيْهِمْ وَأَحْصَىٰ كُلَّ شَىْءٍ عَدَدًۢا
rows.translation: So that He may know if they have delivered their Lord's messages. He comprehends all that has been given them, and keeps count of everything.
rows.transliteration: liya`lama an qad ablaghū risālāti rabbihim wa-aḥāṭa bimā ladayhim wa-aḥṣā kulla shay-in `adadā
